pages.text: Legend says the title $(l:codex_the_king_of_so_fragrant)"King of 'So Fragrant'"$() originates from an ordinary foodâ€”egg fried rice. He comprehended the truth of "So Fragrant" upon tasting a bowl of egg fried rice, eventually becoming the legendary figure he is today.

A long-lost delicacy, said to be made from a recipe written by the King of "So Fragrant" himself, capable of making all who eat it praise it from the bottom of their hearts: "So Fragrant!". Provides various buffs after consumption.
Egg fried rice blessed by the King of "So Fragrant" himself, brought into the world by the $(l:the_shining_star)HUAJI Star$(). Provides more and stronger buffs after consumption.
